document_data.name: ''Boots of Stalking''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Boots of stalking''''' were enchanted [[boots]], invaluable to creatures in need of stealth.
document_data.Description: These boots were soft and black-colored boots.
document_data.Powers: ''Boots of stalking'' allowed the wearer to activate their ''[[invisibility]]'' spell-like ability. Additionally, the boots increased the wearer's movement speed. An average pair possessed three charges of the ''invisibility'' spell.
document_data.History: In [[1369 DR]], a pair of these night-black boots were in possession of a group of [[orog]] renegades in the [[Elven Catacombs]], who rebelled against their kin and the [[Cult of the Dragon]] employees.
